properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

authors.author: Fanny Jane Crosby | William Howard Doane

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Pass me not
O gentle Savior
Hear my humble cry
While on others
Thou art calling
Do not pass me by

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Savior Savior
Hear my humble cry
While on others
Thou art calling
Do not pass me by

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Let me at
Thy throne of mercy
Find a sweet relief
Kneeling there
In deep contrition
Help my unbelief

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Trusting only in Thy merit
Would I seek Thy face
Heal my wounded broken spirit
Save me by Thy grace

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Thou the Spring
Of all my comfort
More than life to me
Whom have I on earth
Beside Thee
Whom in heaven but Thee
